name: Axe and Roses
description:
A small introduction to our team. @hippunk, @vrarr and @neodan are our valliant programmers. Apart from the red glowing eyes and the thirst for human blood, they’re quite alright.@dyzzyd was our graphic designer for this Ludum Dare, and his METAL barbarian portraits are all awesome. @remysicality is our sound designer. He likes death metal, pink and unicorns. @desdemone, @pomme and @luveh are our team of ripped (no) writers. They managed not to bite anyone during the jam, and we must praise them for that effort.

We are pleased to introduce you to second Ludum entry, Axe and Roses, in which you play as a bored barbarian who’s trying to find love. You can only date 3 colourful characters for the moment but we may add more in our post-Ludum updates.

We are very proud of what we’ve done for this jam. This time, we don’t think we have forgotten the fun as much as in our first submission, and we had a lot of fun ourselves coding, writing, drawing it. We hope you’ll enjoy !
